text:
Hello team,

I need some help with an issue I’m facing. I have a code that I want to upload to HubSpot using a specific template. However, when I try to do it, the template doesn’t appear for some reason. I’m looking for someone who can provide some guidance or explain how I can ensure my template is visible and my code is correctly placed in the body.

I’ll share a video explaining the issue in detail in case it helps clarify things. Any advice or assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

Hi,
I'm working with the sample UI apps and I can't seem to run the apps in vscode so I can debug. I can run the apps as shown in the tutorials. How are you all debugging these apps in development?
